entry.title: $2350 // NO FEE super spacious and bright one bedroom in the UWS!
entry.content:
NO FEE super spacious and bright one bedroom in the UWS!

*PRICE SHOWN IS THE NET EFFECTIVE RENT WITH 1 MONTH FREE ON AN 18 MONTH LEASE*

Awesome block surrounded by shops, dining, nightlife and so much more! The apartment building is located within walking distance to the 79th Street 1 train and the 81st Street B/C lines. Walk to Central Park and enjoy amazing jogging trails along the river! The apartment is spacious with plenty of closet space and sunshine in each room. Decorative fireplace in the living room and beautiful exposed brick leading into the bedroom. The kitchen was recently updated with contemporary finishes.

New to the market, contact us today to set up a viewing! Pet friendly and owner managed. No fee!

206 West 83rd Street
Apartment 4R
Available Now!
Rent: $2350.38

Contact directly for details and process
kevincorriveau101(@)gmail(.)com
